Abilities: Str 27, Dex 13, Con 19, Int 2, Wis 12, Cha 6

Descripci\u00f3n: These massive carnivores weigh more than 1,800 pounds and stand nearly 9 feet tall when they rear up on their hind legs. They are bad-tempered and territorial. The brown bear’s statistics can be used for almost any big bear, including the grizzly.

Combate: A brown bear attacks mainly by tearing at opponents with its claws.Improved Grab (Ex): To use this ability, a brown bear must hit with a claw attack.
